article.title: Structure-Based Subspace Method for Multi-Channel Blind System Identification

multiple_choice_question.text: This formula defines a specific type of matrix encountered in signal processing. What is the name of this matrix?
This equation represents a key property exploited in the standard subspace method. What does this equation essentially represent?
choices: Eigenvalue decomposition of the channel matrix
Orthogonality between the noise subspace and the channel matrix
Convolution operation in the time domain
Relationship between signal and noise power

multiple_choice_question.text: This formula defines the cost function minimized in the proposed SSS method. What is the primary goal of minimizing this specific cost function?
choices: Enforcing orthogonality between signal and noise subspaces
Simultaneously achieving subspace fitting and enforcing Toeplitz structure
Reducing computational complexity compared to the SS method

multiple_choice_question.text: This equation represents the simplified form of the optimization problem in the SSS method. What type of mathematical problem does this equation represent?
